en.purpose: To derive the TNM stage group and the corresponding FIGO stage for ovarian, fallopian tube, and primary peritoneal carcinoma based on recorded clinical TNM categories.
en.use:
Use to stage ovarian, fallopian tube, and primary peritoneal carcinoma by processing the following clinical inputs:

Inputs
- Clinical T category (primary tumour extent)
- Clinical N category (regional lymph node involvement)
- Clinical M category (distant metastasis)

Outputs
- Derived TNM stage group (Stage I–IV)
- Corresponding FIGO stage (including applicable substages)
en.misuse: Not to be used for pathological TNM (pTNM) staging. Not to be used for staging of other gynaecological malignancies.
